title: Anthony Lucas talks about 'The Cabinet of Anthony Lucas: The Faulty Fandangle'
creator_credit: Jason White, Csilla Csongvay and ACMI
brief_description: Oscar nominated animator Anthony Lucas (‘The Mysterious Geographic Explorations of Jasper Morello’) speaks candidly about his creative processes and inspirations. He introduces his latest work, ‘The Cabinet of Anthony Lucas: The Faulty Fandangle’, commissioned for ACMI’s ‘Screen Worlds’ exhibition. He takes us on a creative adventure from beginning to end, starting with initial ideas and inspiration, right through to the creation of the on-screen animation and mechanised components.
